attributes.action: Re-introduce voluntary re-patriation to help control over population.
attributes.additional_details:
Providing the UK withdraws from the EU, voluntary re-patriation would be a fair and realistic way of dealing with the strain on resources, jobs and housing and has been shown to be popular in other countries.  Surveys show it would be popular with many foreigners themselves.

A generous cash grant to both the individual/family and/or country of origin could easily be financed from the billions currently wasted on foreign aid, membership of the EU and immoral foreign wars.
